page.title: 04EXMOUTH BEACH SURVEY
page.content: On the 18/6/85 all the 6th year went to Sandy Bay to gather information. We were in groups, my group did a survey of people on the beach and what they were doing. 295 people were counted. 19% were aged 0/10 53% were aged 10/30 17% were aged 30/50 11% were aged 50+ 38% were sitting or lying on the beach. 32% were walking on the beach. 13% were doing sports on the beach. 5% were sailing in boats on the sea. 3% were surfing in the water. 9% were swimming in the sea. Most people were sitting or lying on the sands in the sunshine.The air temperature was 28 degrees celsius. The sea was 20 degrees celsius. The rocks were 21 degrees celsius. 93% of the sky was covered by cloud.
